channel.title: Taking a moment to enjoy Music
channel.description: So I think we all love music, and that's why we're here. Let's just take some time to express our love for music and how music has changed us as a person.

item.title: Taking a moment to enjoy Music
item.dc:creator: sn.ow.y
item.description:
I would have to agree with some of the replies to this thread, for me as well, Auxy was just a way to get into making music and gave me an awesome hobby to pursue.

Read full topic

item.title: Taking a moment to enjoy Music
item.dc:creator: BobTheGUYYYYY
item.description:
Dude, Auxy became one of my main hobbies like right away. It’s such a reliable way to get melodies out of my head that I can’t really express in other ways (being a drummer and all.) I’m really glad it’s here, and I’ve even gotten other people into using it!

Read full topic

item.title: Taking a moment to enjoy Music
item.dc:creator: Osharu
item.description:
Music, and especially Auxy, helps me to escape the real world and all my problems and bullies, music allowed me to enter a new one where anything is possible, music wise of course… but at the end of the day, Auxy allows me to be me, not many music apps let you do that!

Read full topic
item.source: Taking a moment to enjoy Music

item.title: Taking a moment to enjoy Music
item.dc:creator: corey
item.description:
I’ve been making music since the early 90’s. I started producing dance music on hardware because computers weren’t fast enough!

I pursued a music career for about 15 years and finally had to give up. It wasn’t fun anymore.

After a few years, I started dabbling again. But jumping back into Ableton brought back all the old habits and I immediately started taking it too seriously.

Then I got an iPad and found Auxy. It strikes such a nice balance. I’m having fun and not sweating the minutia.

Read full topic
item.source: Taking a moment to enjoy Music

item.title: Taking a moment to enjoy Music
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
That is the most adorable thing I’ve seen… like ever.

As for music, I’ve always loved music. I’ve been playing musical instruments since fourth grade, but long before that I always was bopping around on those kid toy pianos and the sort. I don’t know where I would be if I hadn’t gotten my cousin’s iPod and found Fall Out Boy among other bands when I was 16, as it helped me get through a particularly rough patch of teenage growing up pain.

I found the old green auxy through a friend at college who was messing around with it one night outside his dorm room, which was right next to mine. I fell in love immediately, and well the rest is history.

Despite all my problems, complaints and arguments I tend to have because of the app (trust me there’s a lot), I still love Auxy, and I only want the best for it. Maybe that’s why I get so involved emotionally when things become problematic.

Anyway, ramble over, continue on.

Read full topic
item.source: Taking a moment to enjoy Music
